basic_node.title: Standard deviated measuring error
basic_node.description: Possible measuring error, describable by stochastic disturbance variable modeled as zero-mean white noise.
basic_node.references: [pp8, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/978-3-662-48847-8, Measurement equation z_k+1;k: Stochastic disturbance variable w_k+1; p.414-415.] [pp8, http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/4114334/] [pp9, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/978-3-662-48847-8, Measurement equation z_k+1;k: Stochastic disturbance variable w_k+1; p.414-415.] [pp9, http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/4114334/]
